Up.Statement: IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'w2_MemberRankRule' AND COLUMN_NAME = 'target_id') BEGIN ALTER TABLE w2_MemberRankRule ADD target_id NVARCHAR(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT N''; END GO IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'w2_MemberRankRule' AND COLUMN_NAME = 'target_extract_flg') BEGIN ALTER TABLE w2_MemberRankRule ADD target_extract_flg NVARCHAR(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT N'0'; END GO IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'w2_MemberRankRule' AND COLUMN_NAME = 'target_extract_flg5') BEGIN ALTER TABLE w2_MemberRankRule ADD target_extract_flg5 NVARCHAR(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT N'0';
